name: SPECIALTY CROP FARM BILL ALLIANCE
description: A national coalition of more than 120 organizations representing specialty crop growers.
sampleDescriptions: Providing advice on, and preparing draft legislative text of, the SCFBA's publicly available recommendations for the 2018 Farm Bill.
